title: TVS Motor Co starts operations in Italy
description: TVS Motor Company Ltd has launched operations in Italy through TVS Motor Italia, offering a range of conventional and electric scooters and motorcycles. The branch is led by Giovanni Notarbartolo di Furnari, bringing extensive automotive experience. The move aligns with TVS's global ambitions, with plans to introduce products like the TVS Apache 310 Series, Ronin 250, Raider, NTorq, Jupiter 125, iQube, and X. Additionally, e-bikes from Cilo, EGO Movement, Simpel, and EBCO will be offered, showcasing TVS's confidence in the Italian market.
